alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 26 at 12:57PM MST until July 26 at 1:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE WUPATKI TRAILS TO GOVERNMENT TANK WATERSHEDS AND INTO DONEY PARK REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 1254 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated that the heavier rainfall has ended across the warned area. However, flash flooding will remain as water drains. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Wupatki Trails to Government Tank Watersheds. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Wupatki Trails to Government Tank Watersheds and into Doney Park. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Flagstaff, Timberline, Hutchison Acres, Wupatki Trails, Fernwood, Doney Park, Little Elden Spring Horse Camp and Lockett Meadow Campground. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 423 and 429. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Schultz Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Immediately move out of and away from creeks and washes in the Wupatki Trails to Government Tank Watersheds. Flash flooding is occurring or imminent. Turn Around, Don`t Drown if you encounter flood waters while driving. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
